price: 16. Nejudink savo liežuvio su juo (Muchammedai ﷺ) tam, kad paskubintum jį (t. y. Korano recitavimą).
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
